__TOC__

In celebration of the release of Ubuntu 7.10 (Gutsy Gibbon), the Indiana Ubuntu Local Community team had a Gutsy Release Party (dinner) starting at 7:10 PM on Saturday, October 20, 2007 at the <nowiki>[[http://www.claddaghirishpubs.com|Claddagh Irish Pub]]</nowiki> at 3835 East 96th Street in Indianapolis. 

<nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?q=3835+East+96th+Street+indianapolis&ie=UTF8&oe=UTF-8&client=firefox-a&cd=1&z=16&iwloc=addr&om=1|Map and  Directions]]</nowiki>
